definition: classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)
(arch.) minister/official/noun prefix denoting function or status/a youth

sentences.chinese: 我們會監控令郎的進展。

sentences.english: Your son sets low personal standards and then consistently fails to achieve them.
sentences.chinese: 令郎自設低於常人的標準，又老是達不到。

sentences.english: He is doubtlessly a pride and hope of your family.
sentences.chinese: 令郎無疑是你家的驕傲和希望。

sentences.english: Your family estates of owner piece, sooner or later wants to hand over in the your son's hand of.
sentences.chinese: 張老闆你的家業，遲早要交到令郎手上的嘛。

sentences.english: I was gratified to learn that your son had passed the entrance examination.
sentences.chinese: 得悉令郎已通過入學考試，我十分高興。

definition: uncle (affectionate name for a friend older than one's father)/old friend
my husband and master (archaic)/playboy of rich family/pimp
lit. your honored carriage/your highness/honored Sir (also sarcastic)/you
son of an official/son of nobility/your son (honorific)
